short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare prices across e-commerce  stores in one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Prizeskout is a Chrome extension that helps shoppers save money on their online purchases. With Prizeskout, you can compare prices across  e-commerce stores, add items to your Wishlist, share products with your friends on social media, convert prices to your local currency, and find coupon codes.
Prizeskout is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to get the best possible price on their next online purchase. It's easy to use and install, and it's completely free.
Here are some of the benefits of using Prizeskout:
•	Save money: Compare prices across over 100 e-commerce stores to find the best deal.
•	Stay organized: Add items from different stores to your Wishlist to track your favorite products.
•	Share with friends: Share products with your friends on social media.
•	Convert prices: Convert prices to your local currency to get an accurate idea of the cost.
•	Find coupon codes: Find coupon codes to save even more money.
Install Prizeskout today and start saving money on your online purchases!
